title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 4B Calle Meridiano
description: Very large dirt parking next to the fairgrounds, in December visiting the magical Christmas, very well. commuter station to go to Madrid next door. very calm. some truck and train, but acceptable noise. I would repeat.

title_short: (28512) Villar del Olmo - 1 Calle de la Fuente

title: (19188) Uceda - 11D Avenida Ginebra

title_short: (28160) Talamanca de Jarama - Calle de la Libertad

title: (19192) Gajanejos - 5 Carretera Soria

title: () Budia - Unnamed Road

description: Drinking water source.

title: (19133) Budia - 15 Camino Fuente Larga

There is a small slope of sand, to access but without problems the views. very important service DO NOT ENTER the town through the main entrance, the motorhome does not enter through the plaza, you have to enter through the other entrance 1 km higher, they call it the M 40

But the streets are very narrow, do not adventure in a motorhome in the heart of the village!

title: (19230) Cogolludo - 7-11 Plaza Mayor C

title: (19130) Auñón - CM-2009

title: (28189) Patones - 36 Avenida de Juan Prieto

title: (28840) - 1X Diseminado Ferrocarril

title: (19131) Auñón - Unnamed Road
description: Ermita del Madroñal with esplanade and great views. Source with drinking water.

title: (28189) Patones -
description: It's the parking lot next to the road. During the night it is quite quiet, but if a car passes you hear it and if you arrive during the day it is easy that you will not find a place (at 9:30 when we woke up it was already full). We went by van, it is a flat place to sleep well and quite spacious.

title: (28180) Torrelaguna - 9 Calle Soria
description: Parking on public roads. C / Bernaldo de Quiros. It is a wide street and you can park in line without problem. The water change is next to the sports center but since it is not an area, you can look for this place to spend the night. Typical noises of people walking and a vehicle from time to time. It is right on the side of the Varguillas stream and on the other side are the houses. Public lighting and containers. Level.

title: (28180) Torrelaguna - 8 Camino de la Soledad

title: (28510) Campo Real - 19 Carretera de Madrid
description: It is a small car park, but there is usually room, they have a great water fountain, there is a grill bar and a shop with many products from the area.

title: (19490) Brihuega - 3 Diseminado Civica Distrito
description: A small "abandoned" village where you can see a beautiful waterfall and how the village was carved into the rock. If you are passing through, highly recommended. day parking only. overnight stay is not allowed. suitable for AC and vans.

title: (19133) Alocén - 1 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Petite clairière surplombant la retenue d eau. Lieu calme avec quelques chevreuils de passage

description: Water source

title: (19133) Durón - 23 N-204
description: Good place there is a lot of parking space walking 5 minutes to the town next door there is a park or restaurant

title: (19131) Auñón - N-320

title_short: (28702) San Sebastián de los Reyes - 12 Calle de Alonso Zamora Vicente
description: Parking between houses with plenty of space, can be used to visit micropolix and there is a shopping center nearby, as well as supermarkets. there are more ACs than people who live in the area.

title: (28840) Mejorada del Campo - 3 Calle Argentina
description: Ideal parking to visit the Cathedral of Justo in Mejorada Del Campo. Famous for his Aquarius ad. Spectacular to see the building. The car park is large and great for RVs and Vans. The Police are right in front, so in theory it is a quiet and safe place. You can walk to the Cathedral and there is also a bike lane. Supermarkets, Gas Station, Burger next door. There is a charger for Electric Cars. Very good communication with Carreteras de Madrid such as the M50 or R3 and it is also next to Alcalá De Henares, which is also worth a visit!

title: (19196) Ledanca - 22 Calle Subida Cava
description: Next to the hermitage of Ledanca. Picnic area. Tables, barbecues, fountain. Very beautiful and quiet. It is a street at the exit of the town. No problems sleeping. Quite uneven and care bulky vehicles. DO NOT ACCESS THROUGH LEDANCA. ACCESS FROM ARGECILLA

title: (28180) Torrelaguna - 2 Plaza del Mayo
description: Parking near the barracks of the Civil Guard. A bit noisy because at the edge of the road. near the center.

title: (19237) Jócar -
description: Quiet and very spacious place, with room for many vehicles. In the middle of nature, easily accessible. It's next to the road but you can't hear a thing. There are paths that take you to another area further away from the road, although access is somewhat more complicated.

title: (19133) Alocén - 19 Viaducto de Entrepeñas
description: Quiet place surrounded by nature at the foot of the reservoir. Very quiet at night. Not level In the morning fishermen come first thing in the morning but they weren't cool.

title: (28042) Madrid - 2B Calle Ezequiel Peñalver
description: Next to the highway. A bit noisy.

title: (19112) Albares - 37 Avenida Guadalajara

title_short: (28702) San Sebastián de los Reyes - 14P Poligono Vp Dehesa Vieja

title: (28750) San Agustín del Guadalix -

title: (19128) Pareja - 892 Urbanización Residencial R2
description: Great spot(s) just a bit further down the road from the other great spot on the app. Take a right down the path. We found one flat space near the water. Lots of nice fishermen. No shade. A bit messy but I just take what I can to preserve the nature. We drove a camper van 5 meters long and 2,5m high without problems. Lots of room for activities.

title: (19240) Jadraque - C. Escuelas
description: Parking area with some large location. Recycling containers.

title: (28042) Madrid - 510 Avenida Almanaque

title: (19225) Valdesotos - 18 Calle los Nogales
description: It is the Valdesotos parking lot, you can park and spend the day. It is level and quiet, on weekends it gets crowded. From here the route to the jet starts, a magical place to take a bath.

title: (19225) Retiendas - GU-188
description: Parking 1 and a half km from the bonal monastery on the outskirts of the town (which is next door) in the middle of nature. Quiet and flat place. highly recommended. spectacular night sky

title: (28703) San Sebastián de los Reyes - 5 Calle de las Amazonas
title_short: (28703) San Sebastián de los Reyes - 5 Calle de las Amazonas
description: Parking to spend the night, shopping center, supermarket and restaurant, very quiet

title: (28042) Madrid - 22 Calle de Ayerbe
description: Large free car park, very well lit. Metro 10 minutes, Place Sol 40 minutes. Terminal T2 20 mins walk. Close to Mc Donalds, Repsol, friendly staff, very helpful, professional and efficient. Many bars, restaurants, cafeterias and shops. Very quiet at night and quite busy in the morning. Flight and airport personnel park there. There is therefore constant movement and police rounds. *** no parking Friday evening-late Saturday evening it is market day ***

title: (28703) San Sebastián de los Reyes - 20 Avenida de Tenerife
title_short: (28703) San Sebastián de los Reyes - 20 Avenida de Tenerife
description: Laundry in Dia supermarket

title: (19128) Chillarón del Rey - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful place to sleep. We have spent the night alone super quiet. Very clean. At the entrance of the road there are containers.

title: (19128) Chillarón del Rey - Unnamed Road
description: Spot at the edge of a path that leads to the lake, we stayed two nights without any problem, we passed three cars a day and it was undoubtedly fishermen. We are in a motorhome, the road may seem a bit complicated because of the large stones present, but it goes by going calmly.

title: (19128) Chillarón del Rey - Unnamed Road
description: INCREDIBLE PLACE! Access is more suitable for van and small vehicles, stable, regular trail, accessible but not for motorhomes. Super peaceful to spend the night, sunrise over the beautiful lake, I recommend.

title: (19225) Retiendas - GU-188

title_short: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - Cam. de los Tomillares
description: I found this place looking for a place away from large bottles and people at night on the weekend. The access road is very bumpy and there is a slope that requires a 4x4 or at least a vehicle with a rear lock.

title: (19133) Durón - Unnamed Road
description: Swamp Entrepeñas, perfect to spend the day with your family, if you have a dog, you can swim without any problem

title: (19133) Durón - Unnamed Road
description: Great places right in the middle of the lake, great view of clear blue water. Some vans but nothing really bad, there is space. Bathing advised !!. Just be careful because several small wasp nests in small trees but they do not attack

title: (19120) Sacedón - 224 N-320
description: Viewpoint next to the Reservoir and close to the dam. It is next to a service road with almost no traffic. Parking for 2 vans, quiet and very nice place.

title_short: (28723) Pedrezuela - 42 Calle Cerro de San Pedro

title_short: (28042) Madrid - 45 Calle de la Playa de Riazor

title: (28723) Pedrezuela - 1 Diseminado Cl Eras
description: A very complete playground (several areas, zip line, sports court, trampolines ...) and picnic tables, some with shadows. There are large parking places next door and if not a 3 min walk the municipal parking lot.

title: (19133) Durón - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice spot to spend the day or the night. Super quiet, a few fishermen. Best place to bathe because little mud. Super cool night when we are in a heatwave?
